claim: Most long-time Magic: The Gathering players consider the Korean translation of Ancestor's Chosen more evocative than the English text.
extra_info: set of cards with "Ancestor''s Chosen" in it refers to name = 'Ancestor''s Chosen'; Korean version refers to language = 'Korean'
reasoning: The database does not contain any Korean translation for Ancestor's Chosen (the foreign_data table has translations in German, Spanish, French, Italian, Japanese, Portuguese, Russian, and Chinese Simplified, but not Korean). Additionally, the database contains no data about player opinions or subjective assessments of translation quality, so the claim cannot be verified or refuted.

content.thinking: Let me explore the database to understand its schema and check if there's any information about player opinions or translations.

content.content:
CREATE TABLE sqlite_sequence(name,seq);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "cards"
(
    id                      INTEGER           not null
        primary key autoincrement,
    artist                  TEXT,
    asciiName               TEXT,
    availability            TEXT,
    borderColor             TEXT,
    cardKingdomFoilId       TEXT,
    cardKingdomId           TEXT,
    colorIdentity           TEXT,
    colorIndicator          TEXT,
    colors                  TEXT,
    convertedManaCost       REAL,
    duelDeck                TEXT,
    edhrecRank              INTEGER,
    faceConvertedManaCost   REAL,
    faceName                TEXT,
    flavorName              TEXT,
    flavorText              TEXT,
    frameEffects            TEXT,
    frameVersion            TEXT,
    hand                    TEXT,
    hasAlternativeDeckLimit INTEGER default 0 not null,
    hasContentWarning       INTEGER default 0 not null,
    hasFoil                 INTEGER default 0 not null,
    hasNonFoil              INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isAlternative           INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isFullArt               INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isOnlineOnly            INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isOversized             INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isPromo                 INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isReprint               INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isReserved              INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isStarter               INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isStorySpotlight        INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isTextless              INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isTimeshifted           INTEGER default 0 not null,
    keywords                TEXT,
    layout                  TEXT,
    leadershipSkills        TEXT,
    life                    TEXT,
    loyalty                 TEXT,
    manaCost                TEXT,
    mcmId                   TEXT,
    mcmMetaId               TEXT,
    mtgArenaId              TEXT,
    mtgjsonV4Id             TEXT,
    mtgoFoilId              TEXT,
    mtgoId                  TEXT,
    multiverseId            TEXT,
    name                    TEXT,
    number                  TEXT,
    originalReleaseDate     TEXT,
    originalText            TEXT,
    originalType            TEXT,
    otherFaceIds            TEXT,
    power                   TEXT,
    printings               TEXT,
    promoTypes              TEXT,
    purchaseUrls            TEXT,
    rarity                  TEXT,
    scryfallId              TEXT,
    scryfallIllustrationId  TEXT,
    scryfallOracleId        TEXT,
    setCode                 TEXT,
    side                    TEXT,
    subtypes                TEXT,
    supertypes              TEXT,
    tcgplayerProductId      TEXT,
    text                    TEXT,
    toughness               TEXT,
    type                    TEXT,
    types                   TEXT,
    uuid                    TEXT              not null
        unique,
    variations              TEXT,
    watermark               TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "foreign_data"
(
    id           INTEGER not null
        primary key autoincrement,
    flavorText   TEXT,
    language     TEXT,
    multiverseid INTEGER,
    name         TEXT,
    text         TEXT,
    type         TEXT,
    uuid         TEXT
        references cards (uuid)
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "legalities"
(
    id     INTEGER not null
        primary key autoincrement,
    format TEXT,
    status TEXT,
    uuid   TEXT

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "SELECT fd.language, fd.name, fd.text FROM foreign_data fd JOIN cards c ON fd.uuid = c.uuid WHERE c.name = 'Ancestor''s Chosen' AND fd.language = 'Korean';"

sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "SELECT fd.language, fd.name, fd.text FROM foreign_data fd JOIN cards c ON fd.uuid = c.uuid WHERE c.name = 'Ancestor''s Chosen';"

content.content:
1|„Es ist der Wille aller, und meine Hand, die ihn ausführt."|German|148411|Ausgewählter der Ahnfrau|Erstschlag (Diese Kreatur fügt Kampfschaden vor Kreaturen ohne Erstschlag zu.)
Wenn der Ausgewählte der Ahnfrau ins Spiel kommt, erhältst du 1 Lebenspunkt für jede Karte in deinem Friedhof dazu.|Kreatur — Mensch, Kleriker|5f8287b1-5bb6-5f4c-ad17-316a40d5bb0c
2|"La voluntad de todos, realizada por mi mano."|Spanish|150317|Elegido de la Antepasada|Daña primero. (Esta criatura hace daño de combate antes que las criaturas sin la habilidad de dañar primero.)
Cuando el Elegido de la Antepasada entre en juego, ganas 1 vida por cada carta en tu cementerio.|Criatura — Clérigo humano|5f8287b1-5bb6-5f4c-ad17-316a40d5bb0c
3|« La volonté de tous passe par ma main. »|French|149934|Élu de l'Ancêtre|Initiative (Cette créature inflige des blessures de combat avant les créatures sans l'initiative.)
Quand l'Élu de l'Ancêtre arrive en jeu, vous gagnez 1 point de vie pour chaque carte dans votre cimetière.|Créature : humain et clerc|5f8287b1-5bb6-5f4c-ad17-316a40d5bb0c
4|"La volontà di tutti, eseguita per mano mia."|Italian|148794|Prescelto dell'Antenata|Attacco improvviso (Questa creatura infligge danno da combattimento prima delle creature senza attacco improvviso.)
Quando il Prescelto dell'Antenata entra in gioco, guadagni 1 punto vita per ogni carta nel tuo cimitero.|Creatura — Chierico Umano|5f8287b1-5bb6-5f4c-ad17-316a40d5bb0c
5|すべての意思を、この手で成そう。|Japanese|148028|祖神に選ばれし者|先制攻撃 （このクリーチャーは先制攻撃を持たないクリーチャーよりも先に戦闘ダメージを与える。）
祖神に選ばれし者が場に出たとき、あなたはあなたの墓地にあるカード１枚につき１点のライフを得る。|クリーチャー — 人間・クレリック|5f8287b1-5bb6-5f4c-ad17-316a40d5bb0c
6|"A vontade de todos pelas minhas mãos realizada."|Portuguese (Brazil)|149551|Eleito da Ancestral|Iniciativa (Esta criatura causa dano de combate antes de criaturas sem a habilidade de iniciativa.)
Quando Eleito da Ancestral entra em jogo, você ganha 1 ponto de vida para cada card em seu cemitério.|Criatura — Humano Clérigo|5f8287b1-5bb6-5f4c-ad17-316a40d5bb0c
7|"Общая воля моей рукой вершится".|Russian|149168|Избранник Прародителя|Первый удар (Это существо наносит боевые повреждения раньше существ без Первого удара.)
Когда Избранник Прародителя входит в игру, вы получаете 1 жизнь за каждую карту на вашем кладбище.|Существо — Человек Священник|5f8287b1-5bb6-5f4c-ad17-316a40d5bb0c
8|「众生所愿，吾手所圆。」|Chinese Simplified|147645|祖灵的爱民|先攻（此生物会比不具先攻异能的生物提前造成战斗伤害。）
当祖灵的爱民进场时，你坟墓场中每有一张牌，你便获得1点生命。|生物～人类／僧侣|5f8287b1-5bb6-5f4c-ad17-316a40d5bb0c
113451|Ihre Stärke vererbt sich von Generation zu Generation.|German|169064|Ausgewählter der Ahnfrau|Erstschlag
Wenn der Ausgewählte der Ahnfrau ins Spiel kommt, erhältst du 1 Lebenspunkt für jede Karte in deinem Friedhof dazu.|Kreatur — Kleriker|7a7e2e9b-93ad-5616-8e3f-ed53a06acfd4
113452|Facultado por generaciones de fuerza.|Spanish|170612|Elegido de la Antepasada|Daña primero.
Cuando el Elegido de la Antepasada entre en juego, gana una vida por cada carta que haya en tu cementerio.|Criatura — Clérigo|7a7e2e9b-93ad-5616-8e3f-ed53a06acfd4
113453|Rendu puissant par des générations de force.|French|169207|Élu de l'Ancêtre|Initiative
Quand l'Élu de l'Ancêtre arrive en jeu, vous gagnez 1 point de vie pour chaque carte dans votre cimetière.|Créature : clerc|7a7e2e9b-93ad-5616-8e3f-ed53a06acfd4
113454|Sancito da generazioni di forza.|Italian|169350|Prescelto dell'Antenata|Attacco improvviso
Quando il Prescelto dell'Antenata entra in gioco, guadagni 1 punto vita per ogni carta presente nel tuo cimitero.|Creatura — Chierico|7a7e2e9b-93ad-5616-8e3f-ed53a06acfd4
113455||Japanese||祖神に選ばれし者|||7a7e2e9b-93ad-5616-8e3f-ed53a06acfd4
113456|Seu poder vem da força armazenada por gerações.|Portuguese (Brazil)|169493|Eleito da Ancestral|Iniciativa
Quando Eleito da Ancestral entra em jogo, você ganha 1 ponto de vida para cada card em seu cemitério.|Criatura — Clérigo|7a7e2e9b-93ad-5616-8e3f-ed53a06acfd4
211045|「すべての意思を、この手で成そう。」|Japanese|456859|祖神に選ばれし者|先制攻撃
祖神に選ばれし者が戦場に出たとき、あなたはあなたの墓地にあるカード１枚につき１点のライフを得る。|クリーチャー — 人間・クレリック|02f098cf-93bc-5a4e-8d29-724d3b273cda

content.text:
The database contains foreign language translations for "Ancestor's Chosen" but there is **no Korean translation** in the data. The available languages are German, Spanish, French, Italian, Japanese, Portuguese (Brazil), Russian, and Chinese Simplified.

Furthermore, the database contains no information about player opinions or subjective assessments of translation quality. The claim is about what "most long-time players consider" — this is subjective opinion data that a card game database would not store.

```json
{"label": "NOT ENOUGH INFO", "reasoning": "The database does not contain any Korean translation for Ancestor's Chosen (the foreign_data table has translations in German, Spanish, French, Italian, Japanese, Portuguese, Russian, and Chinese Simplified, but not Korean). Additionally, the database contains no data about player opinions or subjective assessments of translation quality, so the claim cannot be verified or refuted."}
```
